item.title: 欧洲央行夏季暂停宽松周期的理由越来越充分
item.description: 欧洲中央银行预计将在 6 月再次降息，但由于经济状况好于预期，且通胀挑战开始逐渐显现，因此在 6 月之后暂停降息的可能性越来越大。【原文：The European Central Bank is expected to cut interest rates once again in June but the case is growing for a pause beyond that as the economy is holding up better than feared and an inflation challenge is starting to creep up on the horizon.】

item.title: 花旗银行为香港员工推出人工智能工具
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）周四表示，该公司为香港员工推出了一套人工智能（AI）工具--花旗人工智能（Citi AI）。【原文：Citigroup has launched Citi AI, a suite of artificial intelligence (AI) tools for its employees in Hong Kong, the bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国小米公司创始人预计新款电动 SUV 将于七月上市
item.description: 小米公司创始人兼首席执行官雷军周四在一条微博中表示，小米的新款电动 SUV YU7 预计将于 7 月份进入市场。【原文：Xiaomi's new electric SUV, the YU7, is expected to enter the market in July, founder and CEO Lei Jun said in a Weibo post on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲 在债券市场震荡之后，现在进行数据测试
item.description: Johann M Cherian 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Johann M Cherian】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人确定在黎明前投票，让特朗普税收法案顺利通过终点线
item.description: 共和党控制的美国众议院将在周四黎明前试图通过唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的大规模税收和支出法案，在此之前的几个星期，党内一直在就如何大幅削减开支存在分歧。【原文：The Republican-controlled U.S. House of Representatives will attempt to pass President Donald Trump's massive tax and spending bill in the pre-dawn hours of Thursday, following weeks of intra-party divisions of how deeply to cut spending.】

item.title: 联想集团第四财季利润下降 64
item.description: 中国联想集团周四报告称，第四季度利润下降了64%，主要原因是认股权证价值的非现金下降。【原文：China's Lenovo on Thursday reported a 64% decline in fourth-quarter profit, which it said was mostly due to a non-cash decline in the value of warrants.】

item.title: 波兰 Allegro 公司第一季度国内盈利增长 4.8%，确认前景展望
item.description: 波兰最大的电子商务平台 Allegro 周四公布，其国内第一季度盈利增长了 4.8%，并确认了全年业绩展望。【原文：Poland's biggest e-commerce platform Allegro on Thursday reported a 4.8% rise in its domestic first-quarter earnings and confirmed its full-year outlook.】

item.title: 高盛合并亚洲投资银行部门，任命德雷顿为亚太区主管
item.description: 据路透社周四查阅的一份备忘录显示，高盛正在将之前分别管理的三项亚洲投资银行业务整合为一个部门，以整合其区域交易咨询和资本市场能力。【原文：Goldman Sachs is bringing together previously separately-managed three Asian investment banking businesses into one unit to integrate its regional deals advice and capital market capabilities, according to a memo reviewed by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国财政前景堪忧，国债收益率上升，股市下跌
item.description: 周四，较长期限的美国国债收益率创下了 18 个月以来的新高，而亚洲股市和美元则出现下滑，原因是对全球最大经济体财政前景恶化的担忧影响了投资者的情绪。【原文：Longer-dated U.S. Treasury yields hit their highest in 18 months on Thursday, while Asian stocks and the dollar slipped as worries of a worsening fiscal outlook in the world's biggest economy weighed on investor sentiment.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国专家组就新日铁与美国钢铁公司的交易向特朗普提交意见
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士称，一个强大的美国国家安全小组周三就新日铁以 149 亿美元竞购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）一事向唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提交了一份建议书，但未就建议书的内容提供更多细节。【原文：A powerful U.S. national security panel on Wednesday submitted a recommendation to President Donald Trump on Nippon Steel's fraught $14.9 billion bid for U.S. Steel , a person familiar with the matter said, without providing further detail on its contents.】

item.title: 美元因财政忧虑而暴跌，比特币延续创纪录涨势
item.description: 周四，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统试图推动国会通过其全面的支出和减税法案之际，美国财政问题和不温不火的国债拍卖使美元兑日元汇率跌至两周低点。【原文：U.S. fiscal concerns and a tepid auction of Treasury bonds slapped the dollar to a two-week low versus the yen on Thursday, while President Donald Trump tried to push his sweeping spending and tax-cut bill through Congress.】

item.title: 美国库存意外增加导致油价下跌
item.description: 由于美国原油和燃料库存意外增加引发了对需求的担忧，油价周四有所回落，而投资者则保持谨慎，重点关注伊朗与美国重新开始的核谈判。【原文：Oil prices eased on Thursday as unexpected builds in U.S. crude and fuel inventories raised demand concerns, while investors stayed cautious, focusing on renewed Iran-U.S. nuclear talks.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-麦登（Steve Madden）起诉阿迪达斯，以挫败对鞋款设计的挑战
item.description: 以三条平行条纹鞋闻名的阿迪达斯周三被史蒂文-麦登（Steven Madden）告上法庭，称其试图阻止这家美国鞋业公司销售带有两条非平行条纹的时尚运动鞋。【原文：Adidas , known for shoes with three parallel stripes, was sued on Wednesday by Steven Madden over its alleged effort to stop the American shoe company from selling fashion sneakers with two non-parallel bands.】

item.title: 特朗普称正认真考虑将房利美和房地美上市
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，他将在近期就抵押贷款融资公司房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）上市一事做出决定，并称他正在 "非常认真地考虑 "这样做。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he will make a decision in the near future about taking mortgage finance firms Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac public, saying that he is giving "very serious consideration" to doing so.】

item.title: Grupo Werthein 向新的生成式人工智能公司投资 4000 万美元
item.description: 总部位于阿根廷的投资集团 Grupo Werthein 周三表示，该公司推出了人性化生成人工智能服务 Illumia，初始投资额为 4000 万美元。【原文：Argentina-based investment group Grupo Werthein launched Illumia, a humanized generative AI service, with an initial investment of $40 million, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加拿大将在与贝森特的会晤中强调与美国的深厚贸易关系
item.description: 加拿大财政部长周五表示，他将在周三晚些时候与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的讨论中提出加拿大与美国深厚贸易关系的重要性。【原文：Canada's finance minister said on Friday he would raise the importance of the country's deep trading relationship with the U.S. in a discussion with U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent late on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美日财长称当前美元兑日元汇率反映基本面
item.description: 美国财政部表示，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）和日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）周三一致认为，美元兑日元汇率目前反映了基本面。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato agreed on Wednesday that the dollar-yen exchange rate currently reflects fundamentals, the U.S. Treasury Department said.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，耐克将于下周提价，重返亚马逊平台销售
item.description: 据媒体报道，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的关税扰乱了全球供应链，影响了零售商的利润，耐克公司将从下周起提高其几种产品的价格，并将恢复在在线零售巨头亚马逊（Amazon）销售其产品。【原文：Nike is set to raise prices on several of its products starting next week and will also return to selling its products at online retail giant Amazon , according to media reports, as President Donald Trump's tariffs disrupt global supply chains and impact retailers' profits.】

item.title: 德国央行行长纳格尔认为关税问题取得进展但仍需努力
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）周三在加拿大七国集团（G7）会议上对德国电视台说，在解决与美国的破坏性关税争端方面取得了进展，但还有更多障碍需要克服。【原文：There has been progress towards a solution on a damaging tariff dispute with the United States but there are more hurdles to overcome, the Bundesbank's President Joachim Nagel told German television on Wednesday from the G7 meeting in Canada.】

item.title: 福特指控律师事务所欺诈性超额收费，包括每天工作 57-1/2 小时
item.description: 福特汽车周三起诉了加利福尼亚州的几名律师和律师事务所，指控他们根据该州的《柠檬法》虚报法律费用，其中一名律师被指控在一天内收取了 57-1/2 小时的费用。【原文：Ford sued several California lawyers and law firms on Wednesday, accusing them of fraudulently inflating their legal fees under that state's Lemon Law, including one instance where a lawyer allegedly billed 57-1/2 hours in one day.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，沃尔玛将裁员 1500 人以降低开支
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引一位知情人士的话报道，零售业风向标沃尔玛计划裁员约 1500 人，作为降低开支的重组计划的一部分。【原文：Retail bellwether Walmart plans to cut about 1,500 jobs as part of a restructuring plan to lower expenses, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易日：债券警报更加响亮
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: MercadoLibre 将接替创始人加尔佩林出任首席执行官，并任命 Szarfsztejn 担任此职
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周三宣布，首席执行官兼联合创始人 Marcos Galperin 将于 2026 年由现任商务主管 Ariel Szarfsztejn 接替。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre announced on Wednesday that Chief Executive and co-founder Marcos Galperin will be replaced by current commerce head Ariel Szarfsztejn as of 2026.】

item.title: 雪花公司上调年度产品收入预期
item.description: 雪花公司（Snowflake）周三上调了 2026 财年的产品营收预期，押注于企业优先考虑人工智能支出后对其数据分析服务的强劲需求。【原文：Snowflake raised its fiscal 2026 forecast for product revenue on Wednesday, betting on strong demand for its data analytics services as enterprises prioritize artificial intelligence spending.】

item.title: 美国法院称，谷歌和人工智能公司必须面对一位母亲就儿子自杀提起的诉讼
item.description: Alphabet旗下谷歌和人工智能初创公司Character.AI必须面对佛罗里达州一名妇女的诉讼，这名妇女称Character.AI的聊天机器人导致了她14岁儿子的自杀。【原文：Alphabet's Google and artificial-intelligence startup Character.AI must face a lawsuit from a Florida woman who said Character.AI's chatbots caused her 14-year-old son's suicide, a judge ruled on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国 Bilibili 发行 5.75 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 中国在线视频共享平台 Bilibili 周三表示，将发行价值高达 5.75 亿美元的可转换票据，以筹集资金开发其内容生态系统。【原文：China's online video-sharing platform Bilibili said on Wednesday it is offering up to $575 million worth of convertible notes to raise money to develop its content ecosystem.】

item.title: 美国国债拍卖需求冷淡，显示投资者对税收法案和财政赤字感到不安
item.description: 美国财政部周三出售了 160 亿美元的 20 年期债券，但需求疲软，投资者担心美国的债务负担日益加重，因为美国国会正在就一项税收和支出法案进行争论，预计该法案将使财政前景恶化。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department saw soft demand for a $16 billion sale of 20-year bonds on Wednesday with investors worried about the country's increasing debt burden as Congress wrangles with a tax and spending bill that is expected to worsen the fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 中联重科上调年度预期，因人工智能推动需求强劲
item.description: 受益于混合工作趋势和人工智能与产品的融合，Zoom Communications 周三上调了年度收入预期。【原文：Zoom Communications raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, benefiting from hybrid work trends and the integration of artificial intelligence into its products.】

item.title: AT&T 同意以 57.5 亿美元现金收购 Lumen 的消费光纤业务
item.description: AT&T 公司周三表示，已达成以 57.5 亿美元现金收购 Lumen Technologies 消费者光纤业务的交易，无线服务提供商将进一步扩大其全国光纤业务的规模。【原文：AT&T has clinched a deal to acquire Lumen Technologies' consumer fiber operations for $5.75 billion in cash, the companies said on Wednesday, as the wireless provider adds further scale to its national fiber footprint.】

item.title: 七国集团（G7）财政领导人试图淡化关税争端，寻求共识
item.description: 七大工业化民主国家集团（Group of Seven industrialized democracies）的财政领导人周三在加拿大落基山举行会议，试图淡化对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税的争议，并找到一些共同点，以保持论坛的活力。【原文：Finance leaders from the Group of Seven industrialized democracies sought on Wednesday to downplay disputes over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and find some common ground to keep the forum viable as they met in the Canadian Rocky Mountains.】
